comments.body: Didn't know you could do this. Fancy.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +38,42 @@    execution :: (MonadFail m, E.MonadThrow m) => Artifact PomData -> m Text
    execution artifact = do
        ArtifactFiles{..} <- fmap snd <$> artifactFiles artifact
        let configuration =
                map (\(name, value) -> (name, pathToText (releaseDir </> value))) $
